Articles.Content:
While flights are in progress it is helpful to see things like the current eccentricity of your orbit around a particular celestial body, and other orbit info details. It is also nice to see detailed readouts of current vehicle stats side by side like mass, speed (surface/orbit), thrust to weight ratio, etc.

I think having the option to open a details pane, like the parts manager, that has value readouts of "Vessel Info" and "Orbit Info" would be immensely useful.
